title: ProjeckBabyTwin & Dre Vishiss on Life in the Jordan Downs Projects, 03 Greedo & More
description:
Lush brings on Almighty Suspect to cohost this Dre Vishiss and ProjeckBabyTwin interview, where they talk about their come up, family dynamic, the streets, Remble, and more.

-----
00:00 Intro
1:14 - Balancing battle rap and making music
2:08 - Dre and Twin are blood brothers. Twin is 10 years younger than Dre
3:45 - Growing up in Watts. Going to jail and losing homies at a young age
4:45 - Having mixed emotions about gentrification in Watts
8:40 - Dre credits the Hot Boyz with influencing his style and inspiring him to rap
9:25 - People not believing Dre is from Cali because of his lyrical bar-heavy style
10:28 - Twin remembers watching Dre writing raps, going to the studio growing up
14:00 - Twin on getting into music after getting out of jail. Going viral with the first song he ever made
17:44 - Twin on going viral off a video of him rapping in jail
19:46 - Dre was doing songs with 03 Greedo when he was still called Greedy
21:30 - Explaining Greedo’s impact on exporting Grape Street culture with “Mafia Business”
22:57 - Not knowing anything about Greedo’s release or people trying to impersonate him online
24:38 - Drakeo the Ruler blessed Twin with a verse after he got out of jail
25:55 - Twin on doing songs with artists from different neighborhoods
26:56 - Dre explains why they have a song with the same beat as the Baby Stone Gorillas
29:06 - Twin sets the record straight on how to spell his name
33:22 - Dre remembers his viral battle round where he brought out his mom
36:12 - Twin doesn’t think he wants to get into battle rap like Dre
40:51 - Out-of-town rappers have gotten too comfortable in town
42:15 - How the internet has made things easier for robbers
45:14 - Seeing white people walking around Watts
50:24 - Dre on giving back to the hood with the GTB movement and Bags in the Hood
59:45 - Being an active father in their kids’ lives. Dre on feeding his first kid off of battle rap1:01:38 - Twin speaks on what happened to his song with Remble and why he no longer works with him. How Remble ran off with the style
1:04:44 - Twin is onto a new style. New music doesn’t sound like Remble
1:05:33 - How Twin sometimes uses Dre’s lyrical mind to inspire bars or song concepts 
1:08:05 - Anyone can get boo’ed on a battle rap stage (including Cassidy and Fat Joe
-----

Lush brings on Almighty Suspect to cohost this Dre Vishiss and ProjeckBabyTwin interview, where they talk about their come up, family dynamic, the streets, Remble, and more.


-----

00:00 Intro

1:14 - Balancing battle rap and making music

2:08 - Dre and Twin are blood brothers. Twin is 10 years younger than Dre

3:45 - Growing up in Watts. Going to jail and losing homies at a young age

4:45 - Having mixed emotions about gentrification in Watts

8:40 - Dre credits the Hot Boyz with influencing his style and inspiring him to rap

9:25 - People not believing Dre is from Cali because of his lyrical bar-heavy style

10:28 - Twin remembers watching Dre writing raps, going to the studio growing up

14:00 - Twin on getting into music after getting out of jail. Going viral with the first song he ever made

17:44 - Twin on going viral off a video of him rapping in jail

19:46 - Dre was doing songs with 03 Greedo when he was still called Greedy

21:30 - Explaining Greedo’s impact on exporting Grape Street culture with “Mafia Business”

22:57 - Not knowing anything about Greedo’s release or people trying to impersonate him online

24:38 - Drakeo the Ruler blessed Twin with a verse after he got out of jail

26:56 - Dre explains why they have a song with the same beat as the Baby Stone Gorillas
